caption.text: It's back, one of the most sterling examples of the power of our barrel-aged ?#beer program, SOUTHERN CHARRED - 2014 Double Bastard Ale aged in Bourbon Barrels. caption.text: Pout It Black may be over, but the dark #craftbeer is still flowing! 4PM TOMORROW at Stone Brewing World Bistro & Gardens - #Escondido, you can relive the eclipse when we tap Brian Gallagher’s  BREWER'S CASK creation: Stone Coffee Milk Stout w/Vanilla & Macadamia Nuts!

data.text: When do you guys be available in Ontario Canada? @stonebrewingco

@lagunitassucks They were left over from a previous family party. When I had checked if they were there I must have overlooked them or I was just too buzzed. Lol... But after looking for my old Nintendo system in the garage, I came across them but noticed the date said they had expired. Just would like to know if they will still be good to drink.

caption.text: With our emblematic gargoyle, many consider us to be a bit “dark,” but one day a year we go pitch black at POUR IT BLACK. That lights-out soiree took place over the weekend and featured an outrageous bevy of dark #craftbeer. You can’t taste how incredible it was, but thanks to some skilled photographers, you can see what you missed on our @facebook page - http://www.facebook.com/stonebrewingco
